## Table of Contents

### Classes

* [`make`](#make): Install the make package

## Classes

### `make`

Install the make package

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `make` class.

##### `package_name`

Data type: `String[1]`

the name of the package that should be installed

Default value: `'make'`

##### `package_ensure`

Data type: `String[1]`

the desired state of the package

Default value: `'present'`
